purchaseNotice.title: Purchase Notice
description: The conference tickets are sold on a first-come, first-served basis(based on the payment date) and can sell out early.
Please complete your payment before the deadline to receive a discount.
Up to 10 participants can be registered at a time.
Reserved tickets will not be shipped; they will be issued onsite on the first day of the conference.
Any use of false personal information can result in cancellation.
Credit cards are only allow.

refundPolicy.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
description: You can request cancellation and a refund via email to the Secretariat. Send Email
If you request a refund after Sep. 3 (Tue), please understand that the refund will be processed after Sep. 16
(Mon) for administrative reasons. (Processed in an email reception order)
Refund Regulations by Period
- May 13 ~ Aug 9 (Registration due date) : 100% refund
- Aug 24 ~ Sep. 3 (A day before the event) : 80% refund
- From Sep. 4 (For the duration of the event) : No refund

note.title: UDC 2019 <1>Blind Ticket purchase
description: Please remember your registration e-mail and password as they are required when you modify your registration information.
Up to 10 participants can be registered at a time.
We use participant information to issue your Name Tag. If buyer enter other participant’s information instead, please enter the correct information.
When the payment process is completed, we send a registration confirm mail. Please contact UDC secretariat if you have not received your registration confirm mail.
UDC Secretariat(E-mail: udc_regi@intercom.co.kr)
